## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 35,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | To cover forecasted demand and account for potential variability.  Multiple orders of 5,000 and 20,000 units leverage available vendor quantities and minimize excess inventory. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | Higher than player's plan to account for variability and avoid potential stockouts. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 3.9 days                                 |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 6.9 days                                 |
| Comments                          | The recommended order size aims to cover the forecasted demand while ensuring sufficient buffer for potential variations. Ordering 5,000 units then another 20,000 units avoids exceeding the discount threshold while maintaining flexibility. |
